TopicTitle: Sea Dragon Amphibious Light Sport Aircraft. Easy to Fly. Warranty void if flown by Kerbal :)

Articles.Content:
**Sea Dragon amphibious Light Sport Aircraft.**

Featuring the latest in KAX light sport engine technology, the LSA is an affordable, easy to fly high performance personal aircraft based on the [real-world Independent Aircraft Sea Dragon](http://independentaircraft.com/aircraft/).

Built in Aero Model: Stock 1.02

Top speed (sea level): 120 knots

Endurance (full throttle, sea level): approx. 35 mins

Flight Test Notes:

Due to 'deadly hydrodynamics' in stock KSP, you cannot land the plane on water. But you can use the emergency parachute to pancake intact on the water, but not take off again! Good for those awesome seaplane screenshot moments though.

Yes you can land on water with Better Buoyancy, but you will never take off again either! (It will sink!)
